HediffDef.label: voidshard cruciform
HediffDef.description: An installed dark Lazarus seed implant. Once it detects the clinical death of the host, it begins secreting archites to repair broken-down tissues and kickstart the body back to life. This process takes 3 days.\n\nThe higher the anomalous activity level, the likelier side effects will be - namely, infertility and gradual deterioration of mental faculties.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s voidshard cruciform has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

RecipeDef.label: upgrade Lazarus seed with shards
RecipeDef.description: Alter a Lazarus seed by merging it with the shards of a dark archotech, causing it to take longer to resurrect the host and potentially inducing side effects with each resurrection, but nullifying its recharge time.

HediffDef.label: debasement of the cruciform
HediffDef.description: Degeneration caused by the imperfect resurrection brought about by the cruciform.

HediffDef.label: voidshard skipstalker
HediffDef.description: An installed dark personal skipgate generator. Its potency scales with the current anomalous activity level.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s voidshard skipstalker has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

RecipeDef.label: upgrade personal skipgate generator with shards
RecipeDef.description: Alter a personal skipgate generator by merging it with the shards of a dark archotech, improving its capabilities in accordance with the current anomaly activity level.
RecipeDef.jobString: Upgrading personal skipgate generator with shards.

HediffDef.label: voidshard destabilizer
HediffDef.description: An installed dark archotech bioferrite destabilizer. Prevents ghoulizing, rising as a shambler, and metalhorror infections. Does not destroy mutations. Its potency scales with the current anomalous activity level.\n\nDamaging an unnatural entity or affecting it with a psycast may cause it to experience minor burns.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s voidshard destabilizer has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

RecipeDef.label: upgrade archotech bioferrite destabilizer with shards
RecipeDef.description: Alter an archotech bioferrite destabilizer by merging it with the shards of a dark archotech, improving its capabilities in accordance with the current anomaly activity level.
RecipeDef.jobString: Upgrading archotech bioferrite destabilizer with shards.

HediffDef.label: voidshard graviton refresher
HediffDef.description: An installed dark archotech graviton refresher implant. Upon exposure to the gravitic flux of a gravship in flight, it lowers all ability cooldowns by 1 day, plus an additional 7.2 hours per anomalous activity level.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s voidshard graviton refresher has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

RecipeDef.label: upgrade archotech graviton refresher with shards
RecipeDef.description: Alter an archotech graviton refresher by merging it with the shards of a dark archotech, improving its capabilities in accordance with the current anomaly activity level.
RecipeDef.jobString: Upgrading archotech graiton refresher with shards.

HediffDef.label: voidshard marrowheart
HediffDef.description: An installed dark archotech marrowheart. Its potency, and the pain it causes, scale with the current anomalous activity level. It also slightly increases the volume of marrow inside the host's body, enabling an additional substitution.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s voidshard marrowheart has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

RecipeDef.label: upgrade archotech marrowheart with shards
RecipeDef.description: Alter an archotech marrowheart by merging it with the shards of a dark archotech, improving its capabilities in accordance with the current anomaly activity level. It will also enable an additional marrow substitution, but also causes slightly increased pain.

HediffDef.label: voidshard apeliotan lung
HediffDef.description: An installed dark archotech apeliotan lung. Every exhalation is accompanied by a flux in the atomic composition of the surrounding air, enhancing its quality and making it particularly breathable without altering its flammability. The lung's potency, and the radius of its aura, scale with the current anomalous activity level.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s voidshard apeliotan lung has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

li.visTooltip: Adjust the visibility of the Voidshard Apeliotan Lung aura. This does not affect its function.\n\nIf this pawn stops being player-controlled, the aura's visibility will reset to unconditional visibility.
li.visTooltipFantasy: Adjust the visibility of the Voidshard Apeliotan Lung aura. This does not affect its function.\n\nIf this pawn stops being player-controlled, the aura's visibility will reset to unconditional visibility.

RecipeDef.label: upgrade archotech apeliotan lung with shards
RecipeDef.description: Alter an archotech apeliotan lung by merging it with the shards of a dark archotech, improving its capabilities (including the radius of its effect) in accordance with the current anomaly activity level.
RecipeDef.jobString: Upgrading archotech apeliotan lung with shards.

HediffDef.label: voidshard breathtaker
HediffDef.description: An installed dark archotech breathtaker. Anyone nearby (except for mechanoids and unnatural entities) will quickly find their breathing and movement hindered. Destroys gases within half that radius. Its potency, and the radius of its aura, scale with the current anomalous activity level.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s voidshard breathtaker has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

RecipeDef.label: upgrade archotech breathtaker with shards
RecipeDef.description: Alter an archotech breathtaker by merging it with the shards of a dark archotech, improving its capabilities (including the radius of its effect) in accordance with the current anomaly activity level. However, it will no longer be able to steal the breath from unnatural entities.

HediffDef.label: voidshard refinery stomach
HediffDef.description: An installed dark archotech refinery stomach. Produces valuable anomalous resources with every 3-5 meals worth' of nutrition ingested. Unlike other voidshards, its potency DOES NOT scale with the current anomalous activity level.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s voidshard refinery stomach has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

RecipeDef.label: upgrade archotech refinery stomach with shards
RecipeDef.description: Alter an archotech refinery stomach by merging it with the shards of a dark archotech, causing it to produce anomalous materials (or rarely luciferium) instead.
RecipeDef.jobString: Upgrading archotech refinery stomach with shards.

HediffDef.label: voidshard neutralizer
HediffDef.description: An installed dark archotech neutralizer. Prevents random diseases, and near-instantly neutralizes all drugs and diseases. Will not protect against instantaneously fatal drug effects. Its potency scales with the current anomalous activity level, and it also protects against anomalous mutations and metalhorror parasites.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s voidshard neutralizer has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

RecipeDef.label: upgrade archotech neutralizer with shards
RecipeDef.description: Alter an archotech neutralizer by merging it with the shards of a dark archotech, improving its capabilities in accordance with the current anomaly activity level. It will also destroy anomalous mutations, immunize the host against metalhorror infestation, and prevent ghoulizing.\n\nDo not use this procedure on a ghoul, unless you want it to die.

HediffDef.label: voidshard growth stimulator
HediffDef.description: An installed dark archotech growth stimulator. Its potency scales with the current anomalous activity level. It also causes ugly but harmless growths which periodically shed, forming into either twisted meat or bioferrite.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s voidshard growth stimulator has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

RecipeDef.label: upgrade archotech growth stimulator with shards
RecipeDef.description: Alter an archotech growth stimulator by merging it with the shards of a dark archotech, improving its capabilities in accordance with the current anomaly activity level.
RecipeDef.jobString: Upgrading archotech growth stimulator with shards.

HediffDef.label: voidshard thinking kidney
HediffDef.description: An installed dark archotech thinking kidney. Its potency, and the pain it causes, scale with the current anomalous activity level.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s voidshard thinking kidney has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

RecipeDef.label: upgrade archotech thinking kidney with shards
RecipeDef.description: Alter an archotech thinking kidney by merging it with the shards of a dark archotech, improving its capabilities - and the pain it causes - in accordance with the current anomaly activity level.
RecipeDef.jobString: Upgrading archotech thinking kidney with shards.

HediffDef.label: voidshard intercessor
HediffDef.description: An installed dark archotech intercessor. Gains 1 charge every 12 hours, up to a max of 2 charges; when damage is taken, 1 charge is spent to nullify it.

li.letterText: Removal of {PAWN_nameDef}'s voidshard intercessor has caused its dark archotechnological components to slough off. It has coalesced into a metalhorror!

RecipeDef.label: upgrade archotech intercessor with shards
RecipeDef.description: Alter an archotech intercessor by merging it with the shards of a dark archotech, improving its capabilities in accordance with the current anomaly activity level.
